detailedSolution: The vertices are p, q, r, s, and t. The edges are pq, pr, pt, qr, qs, qt, rs, and st.
summarySolution: On a graph the objects are represented with dots and their connects are represented with lines. The dots are the vertices. The vertices are p, q, r, s, and t. The line segments joining the vertices are called edges. The edges are pq, pr, pt, qr, qs, qt, rs, and st.
